group.name: The Brussels Own Your Life Meetup Group

description:
This workshop will introduce you to a concept relating to the mind, which will show you how, by using the power of your thoughts, you can attract the things you really want into your life. You will learn what your mental faculties are and how these are the tools that can help you transform any dream into reality. Come with a dream you have not yet manifested, and learn how to set it in motion!

Workshop schedule: 
Doors open: 10:15
Starts: 10:30
Ends: 12:00
Socializing: 12:00-12:30
Cost: FREE

Additional information: 
• There is a max. number of participants set, because you will benefit more from this workshop in a small group.
• The first on the waiting list will automatically be moved onto the participants list if somebody cancels.
• Please only RSVP if you are sure you can attend. If your agenda changes, please update your status asap.
name: Think! Use the Power of Thought to create the life you REALLY want.

name: Workshop on how to use your creative faculties to achieve your goals

group.name: The Brussels Own Your Life Meetup Group

description:
It is essential to develop the habit of reading if we want to own our lives. All the books that you need to change your life have already been written! You just need to set aside time every day to read them. To help you in this task, we're offering a regular book club discussion on a great selection of personal development/self help books. So come along and join us.

This month, we're reading "You'll See It When You Believe It" by Wayne Dyer.
To order the book, click here.
Read the book in advance at least once (more times is even better). During the meeting, we will discuss different sections of the book, focusing on those parts that have captured our attention the most, and also expressing our own feelings and insights in relation to the material. No previous experience of the genre is required. What is required is a clear and open mind, and plenty of enthusiasm!

Book Club schedule:
Doors open: 19:15
Starts: 19:30
Ends: 21:00
Cost: FREE
name: Book Club discussion: "You'll See It When You Believe It"

group.name: The Brussels Own Your Life Meetup Group

description:
Let's meet for an after-work drink and intention-setting social gathering. We can wish each other a Happy New Year and share the goals we have set ourselves for the year to come. We can also find accountability partners, who will be there to help us stay on track!

Location: somewhere in Brussels (to be confirmed closer to the date)
name: New Year, New You
